bibl.title: Cleopatra's Egypt. Age of the Ptolemies.
bibl.author: Bianchi Bagnall Goyon Quaegebeur
bibl.note: Catalog of an exhibition held at the Brooklyn Museum Oct. 7, 1988 - Jan. 2, 1989, the Detroit Institute of Arts, Feb. 14 - April 30, 1989, and Kunsthalle der Hypo-Kulturstiftung in Munich, June 8 - Sept. 10, 1989. - The Catalog includes Essays by R.S. Bianchi, R.S. Bagnall, J.-Cl. Goyon and J. Quaegebeur.
